To ensure your concerns are directed to the appropriate parties, below please find a listing of numbers and positions.

 Grand Saline City Hall | 132 E. Frank Grand Saline, TX 75140 | Phone: 903-962-3122 | Fax: 903-962-3363

City Secretary: Julie Fisher

Ext: 2204

Email: jfisher@grandsalinetx.gov

Police Department/Record Department:

903-962-3145

(non-emergency)

Email: records@grandsalinetx.gov

Ext: 2224

Email: jbarker@grandsalinetx.gov

Volunteer Fire Department: Jeremy Barker

Ext: 2224

jbarker@grandsalinetx.gov

Ext: 2260

saltpalace@grandsalinetx.gov

Court Clerk: Karrie Rodgers

Ext: 2205

Email: krodgers@grandsalinetx.gov

Ext: 2205

Email: bpearson@grandsalinetx.gov

Ext: 2250

Email: cmosher@grandsalinetx.gov

Fire Marshall: Christian Barajas

Ext: 2211

Email: cbarajas@grandsalinetx.gov

Ext: 2240

Email: mrogers@grandsalinetx.gov

Ext: 2201

Email: sphillips@grandsalinetx.gov
